description: This file declares an interface class IFactories within the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace, providing factory methods to generate proxies for various Web-related types, such as Request, Response, FileBody, and JSONRPC message. It also includes type aliases and licensing information.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An interface for factory methods to create proxy objects for web requests, responses, file bodies, and JSONRPC messages within the WPEFramework plugin host.

methods.name: ~IFactories
methods.description: Virtual destructor for the IFactories interface.

methods.name: Assign
methods.description: Static method to assign an instance of IFactories.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Static method to retrieve the singleton instance of IFactories.

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Static method to check if the factories are available.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy for Web::Request.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy for Web::Response.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy for Web::FileBody.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Creates and returns a proxy for Web::JSONBodyType<Core::JSONRPC::Message>.
